@jakedowns @observablehq How did you get your notebook to be so beautiful (is there a dark mode I don't know about)
@izzyz @liveblocks “Where is that monthly aggregation of the dataset?” “Oh, I left it on the table in the data processing room. We should maybe hang it by the entrance so its easier to find.”

@izzyz @liveblocks Say I have 3 cells that are different options for a visual form, I want to put them on a virtual white board and let people grab them, change them, and then place their variations underneath, or fling them off into the distance, I want to build a shared memory palace

@izzyz I would love to have a collaborative space like mozilla hubs or maybe something more basic with @liveblocks where me and some colleagues (keyboard/mouse, not necessarily in VR) can arrange things spatially and tweak parameters together and see the results
I am so excited about this https://t.co/UONmeEmy1r
